content.NAME: Katana
content.DESCRIPTION: Swift notches with high reach. Allows for more speed. Damage scales with speed.

content.NAME: Wings
content.DESCRIPTION: Two wings propulsing backwards. Gives a high air mobility.

content.NAME: Daggers
content.DESCRIPTION: Very fast stabs with low reach. Chaining attacks rewards with a higher critical rate.

content.NAME: WarAxe
content.DESCRIPTION: Slow swings with a very high reach. High damage, but only on the Axe's blades.

content.NAME: Gun
content.DESCRIPTION: Fire small bullets that stops on hit. Very high firing rate.

content.NAME: Shuriken
content.DESCRIPTION: Sends a fast and large projectile able to go throught enemies.
